nodes.text: the doctrine of justification by faith which has strong support in the Christian scriptures leads inevitably to exclusivism to the idea that all who reject Christian doctrine must be damned no matter how good they may be by ordinary standards.
we cannot earn salvation by our works.
The mark of our having been forgiven is that God by an act of grace gives us faith.
those among us who lack faith in Jesus have not received grace have not been forgiven and will if we continue in that state go to Hell.
if we are justified it is by faith in Jesus
Our works are not faith in Jesus
